title: Soursop Production Techniques- A training for Belize

tasks.task: Pollination and fruit protection for soursop trees
subtasks: Collect pollen grain from male flowers
Identify female flowers and transfer pollen grain using a brush
Observe fruit development after pollination (60 days)
Protect developing fruits from seed borers using net bags (2 months)
Remove excess branches and maintain tree structure
Manage pruning debris and incorporate into soil
Proper harvesting techniques (using shears, cutting near padangl stalk)
Stimulate new flowers and buds through careful pruning and harvesting
Avoid fruit contact with leaf and branch debris to prevent anthracnose
Utilize warm compost and biofertilizers for nutrient application
Balance pruning with nutrient input for maximum yield
Encourage continuous flowering and fruiting through proper practices
Apply net bags to protect fruits from seed borers during critical成长阶段
